[plaster.loader_factory]
egg = plaster_pastedeploy:Loader
egg+pastedeploy = plaster_pastedeploy:Loader
ini = plaster_pastedeploy:Loader
ini+pastedeploy = plaster_pastedeploy:Loader

[plaster.wsgi_loader_factory]
egg = plaster_pastedeploy:Loader
egg+pastedeploy = plaster_pastedeploy:Loader
ini = plaster_pastedeploy:Loader
ini+pastedeploy = plaster_pastedeploy:Loader
